properties.title: Backend Errors
properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/containerinsights/alex-counter-service/application' | fields @timestamp, log, kubernetes.pod_name
| filter kubernetes.namespace_name = 'prod' and kubernetes.container_name = 'backend'
| filter log like /error|Error|ERROR|exception|Exception|traceback/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50

properties.title: All Backend Logs
properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/containerinsights/alex-counter-service/application' | fields @timestamp, log, kubernetes.pod_name
| filter kubernetes.namespace_name = 'prod' and kubernetes.container_name = 'backend'
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100

properties.title: All Frontend Logs
properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/containerinsights/alex-counter-service/application' | fields @timestamp, log, kubernetes.pod_name
| filter kubernetes.namespace_name = 'prod' and kubernetes.container_name = 'frontend'
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100

properties.title: Pod Restarts / CrashLoops
properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/containerinsights/alex-counter-service/dataplane' | fields @timestamp, log
| filter log like /BackOff|CrashLoop|OOMKilled|Error/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50

properties.title: Log Volume by Pod (last 1h)
properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/containerinsights/alex-counter-service/application' | filter kubernetes.namespace_name = 'prod'
| stats count(*) as log_lines by kubernetes.pod_name
| sort log_lines desc
